# EntityCanFlyComponent Class (Version 1.x.x)

> [!IMPORTANT]
> This documentation is for an older version of this module. Go to the latest documentation [*here*](../../../scriptapi/minecraft/server/EntityCanFlyComponent.md).

## Extends
- [*EntityComponent*](EntityComponent.md)

When added, this component signifies that the entity can fly, and the pathfinder won't be restricted to paths where a solid block is required underneath it.

## Constants

### **componentId**
`static read-only componentId = "minecraft:can_fly";`

Type: *string*
